snippet.title: Ambition of the Slimes - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
This is a strategic turn-based RPG, but it is Slimes that you control. Slimes can take over an enemy and control them in battle.

For example, a Slime can utilise archers, or use magic if they take over a magician. They can even bewilder an enemy with a bribe if they take over a merchant.

In addition there are various kinds of Slimes:

Some of them can warp.
Some of them can improve the abilities of the possessed enemy.
And many more...

Each stage poses key strategic questions. Which Slime will you use on each enemy? How will you take them over?

For example the element of a Slime is very important for a capture. This is a tough game, too, so you cannot win by charging in recklessly - tactics are vital.

The appearance of this game may be lighthearted, but a big challenge awaits!

Developed by altairworks
Published by Flyhigh Works / CIRCLE Entertainment
Also released on Nintendo Switch and 3DS.

#steam #games #steamgames #gaming #steamgame #slimes #ambitionoftheslimes #theforeseenarcade

FUN FACT: The game first released all the way back in 2015 for iOS and PlayStation Vita, the latter of which as part of the now-discontinued "PlayStation Mobile", which was essentially Sony Interactive Entertainment's answer to Xbox Live Indie Games on the 360, with the bonus being that it also allowed the games to be playable on compatible Sony Xperia phones, including the Xperia PLAY. The 3DS version came out a year later as an eShop exclusive, until finally releasing on PC (and Nintendo Switch eShop) in 2018.
